alert.note: Alert for Clark (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 02 at 2:02AM CST until January 02 at 9:00AM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter to one half mile in dense fog. * WHERE...In Iowa, Des Moines and Lee Counties. In Illinois, Mercer, Henderson, Warren, Hancock and McDonough Counties. In Missouri, Clark County. * WHEN...Until 9 AM CST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Reduced visibility will make travel conditions hazardous for the morning commute.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
